frontMatter.title: Code Is More Than Code
frontMatter.summary: In climate, the unfair advantage isn’t always software — it’s the insider edge that lets you build what others can’t. Code is also policy, data, science, and asymmetric information.
frontMatter.description: In climate tech, code isn’t just software — it’s insider knowledge, proprietary data, policy fluency, and scientific edge. It’s the founder’s unfair advantage.
